name: Nicholas Jackson
bio: Nicholas Jackson, a dynamic Central Midfielder, is known for his razor-sharp passing and tenacious tackling. At 32 years old, he blends experience with youthful exuberance, mesmerizing fans with his flashy footwork and unyielding spirit on the field. Hailing from the vibrant landscapes of the USA, his infectious enthusiasm and flair embody the wild essence of Everglade FC, captivating the South Florida crowd with every touch.
